Job Title: Senior Electrical Engineer

Location: Middletown, CT

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Wright-Pierce, a growing, award-winning, multi-discipline environmental engineering firm specializing in water, wastewater and civil infrastructure, is seeking a licensed Senior Electrical Engineer in our Middletown, CT office. This position entails evaluation, design and construction engineering for water/wastewater treatment, civil infrastructure and industrial facilities including low to medium voltage power distribution systems, process control systems, lighting systems, fire alarm systems, security systems and communications systems.

Responsibilities

Evaluation, design and construction engineering for water/wastewater treatment, civil infrastructure and industrial facilities including low to medium voltage power distribution systems, process control systems, lighting systems, fire alarm systems, security systems and communications systems. Prepare technical writing including memoranda, letters, reports, specifications, and submittal reviews. Proactively coordinate work with other design disciplines on multi-disciplinary projects to produce a fully coordinated set of bidding documents. Develop construction cost estimates. Perform site inspections for studies, design, and construction projects. Perform field visits to review contractor's work and resolve field related issues. Perform field visits to observe contractor's demonstration testing of electrical gear. Mentor and delegate to staff. Monitor budget status for assigned projects. 

Essential Functions

Effective written and verbal communication skills and interpersonal skillsEffective personal organization and time management skillsAble to build strong relationship with coworkers and clientsAble to work efficiently and independently on multiple projects while meeting budgets and scheduleProficient with Microsoft Teams and BluebeamCommitted to continual learningExcellent attention to detail

Experience

15 years of experience preferably in the water/wastewater field. Working knowledge of the National Electric Code. Familiarity with industrial control system narratives and P&IDs considered a plus. Experience using Bluebeam required. Experience using Revit/AutoCAD/ considered a plus. 

Certifications

Registered Professional Engineer

Education

BS Degree in Electrical Engineering

Equal Employment Opportunity

Wright-Pierce is an EEO Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, national origin, gender, transgender, age, religion, disability, sexual orientation, veteran status, or marital status.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
